title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Circuit Breaker, Saga & Strangler Fig: Patterns for Transformation (MAM358)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 断路器、Saga 和绞杀者无花果：转型模式 (MAM358)
abstract: Design patterns are powerful tools for software architects. When modernizing legacy applications, three patterns hold special significance: Strangler Fig, Circuit Breaker, and Sagas. In this session, we'll explore how these patterns create a resilient pathway from legacy systems to modern architectures. Strangler Fig helps incrementally modernize your architectural style, away from Monolith. Circuit Breaker shields from cascading failures and supports the design of self-healing systems. Sagas manage the interaction of systems, such as distributed transactions, including compensation strategies and data consistency across microservices. Leave this session with a solid understanding of how these patterns can power your transformation journey.
abstract_cn: 设计模式是软件架构师的强大工具。在现代化遗留应用程序时，三种模式具有特殊意义：绞杀者无花果模式、断路器模式和Saga模式。在本次会议中，我们将探讨这些模式如何创建从遗留系统到现代架构的弹性路径。绞杀者无花果模式帮助逐步现代化您的架构风格，摆脱单体架构。断路器模式防止级联故障并支持自愈系统的设计。Saga模式管理系统间的交互，如分布式事务，包括补偿策略和微服务间的数据一致性。通过本次会议，您将深入理解这些模式如何为您的转型之旅提供动力。
